message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $115 for it. This allows us both to reach a fair agreement.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $112. This allows us to maintain a reasonable balance between our expectations.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway and offer $111? I think this would be a fair compromise.
